member.name: T:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.CentralTextModule.TextHolderModule
member.summary: Class for initializing the module for holding, displaying and handling changes (through commands) to the current text.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

The unity DI container (obtained through DI).

member.name: M:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.CentralTextModule.TextHolderModule.Initialize
member.summary: Registers a unique instance of the text view-model in the dependency injection container and registers the text view with the region manager to the corresponding region of the window.

member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.summary: Gets the command for adding a string to the current text.
member.value: The command for adding a string to the current text.

member.summary: Gets or sets the command for removing the last character from the current text.
member.value: The command for removing the last character from the current text..

member.summary: Gets or sets the command for removing the last word from the current text.
member.value: The command for removing the last word from the current text.

member.name: M:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.CentralTextModule.ViewModels.TextViewModel.AppendText(System.String)

member.name: M:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.CentralTextModule.ViewModels.TextViewModel.CombineWithAccentBuffer(System.String)
member.summary: Combines a pending accent to a new character.
member.returns: The accentuated character if it can be accentuated with the pending accent; otherwise returns the original character.

member.name: M:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.CentralTextModule.ViewModels.TextViewModel.RemoveWhitespaceIfNecessaryFromString(System.String)
member.summary: Removes trailing white-spaces if necessary given the new character to be appended.
member.param: The new character to be appended.
member.remarks: This is necessary, for example, when there is a space and a comma is to be added: "Hello ," versus "Hello,"; this case occurs when the suggestion module is used, which auto-adds spaces after words.
